MapEditorTest

类 ConquestMapTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • MapEditorTest.ConquestMapTest

  • public class ConquestMapTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a test class for class ConquestMap, for the functions which can edit the map.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ConquestMapTest() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void setUp()
      Set up function, to do some initial work.
      void testAddContinent()
      test class: ConquestMap. function: addContinent().
      void testAddTerritory()
      test class: ConquestMap.
      void testBuildTerritoryLinks()
      test class: ConquestMap, function: buildTerrtoryLicks(), check if we can build licks of territories.
      void testClear()
      test class: ConquestMap, function clear(). check when we clear the map, if the continent list and the territories list size are 0.
      void testCountTerritories()
      test class: ConquestMap, function: countTerritories(). check if the specific continent"Kala" has 7 territories.
      void testDeleteContinent()
      test class: ConquestMap, function: deleteContinent().
      void testDeleteTerritory()
      test class: ConquestMap, functionL: findTerritory(), check if there is the specific territory in the territories list when deleting it.
      void testEachTerInContReachable()
      test class: ConquestMap, function eachTerInContReachable(), check the territories of the map is boarding each other when given a target continent, check a new territory is boarding to each other we want when we add it in the map.
      void testEachTerReachable()
      test class: ConquestMap, function eachTerReachable(), check the territories of the map is boarding each other when we load a map, check a new territory is boarding to each other we want when we add it in the map.
      void testFindContinent()
      test class: ConquestMap,function: findContinent(), check if we can find a new continent when we add it.
      void testFindTerritory()
      test class: ConquestMap, function: FindTerritory(), check if a territories list has the specific territory.
      void testLoad()
      test class: ConquestMap, function: ConquestMap.territories().size(), test class: Territory, function: getContinent(), test class: Continent, function: getName(). check if a map including a specific terrtories list, and if there is a specific territory.
      void testLoadInvalidMap()
      test class: ConquestMap, function load(). check if there is a error message when we load a invalid map file.
      void testSaveString()
      test class ConquestMap, function: addContinent(), function save(). check if we can add a new continent and save as a new map file in the local
      void testUpdateContinent()
      test class: ConquestMap, function: updateContinent(), check if the continent information is updated or not when we change the continent's name and bonus.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Set up function, to do some initial work.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - If the target map is not valid, it would throw an exception.

      • testAddContinent

        public void testAddContinent()
        test class: ConquestMap. function: addContinent(). Check if add a new continent the size of the continents list is changed or not.

      • testAddTerritory

        public void testAddTerritory()
        test class: ConquestMap. Function: addTerritory(). Check if when adding a new territory to the conquest map, the territory list contains the new territory.

      • testClear

        public void testClear()
        test class: ConquestMap, function clear(). check when we clear the map, if the continent list and the territories list size are 0.

        public void testDeleteContinent()
        test class: ConquestMap, function: deleteContinent(). Check if there is not Continent for territories when deleting the continent "Kala".
